-- | <tt>Token</tt> is a representation of a word, which consists of a
--   number of fields.
type Token = Vector Text

-- | <tt>Field</tt> is a part of a word token, such as word form, lemma or
--   POS tag
type Field = Text

-- | <tt>Sentence</tt> is a vector of tokens.
type Sentence = Vector Token

-- | <tt>parse text</tt> returns a lazy list of sentences.
parse :: Text -> [Sentence]


-- | Word Class induction with LDA
--   
--   This module provides function which implement word class induction
--   using the generic algorithm implemented in Colada.LDA.
--   
--   You can access and set options in the <tt>Options</tt> record using
--   lenses. Example:
--   
--   <pre>
--   import Data.Label
--   let options =   set passes 5 
--                 . set beta 0.01 
--                 . set topicNum 100 
--                 $ defaultOptions
--   in run options sentences
--   </pre>
module Colada.WordClass

-- | <tt>learn options xs</tt> runs the LDA Gibbs sampler for word classes
--   with <tt>options</tt> on sentences <tt>xs</tt>, and returns the
--   resulting model together with progressive class assignments
learn :: Options -> [Sentence] -> (WordClass, [Vector (Vector Double)])
defaultOptions :: Options

-- | <tt>summary m</tt> returns a textual summary of word classes found in
--   model <tt>m</tt>
summary :: WordClass -> Text
summarize :: Bool -> WordClass -> Text

-- | <tt>wordTypeClasses m</tt> returns a Map from word types to
--   unnormalized distributions over word classes
wordTypeClasses :: WordClass -> Map Text (IntMap Double)

-- | <tt>label m s</tt> returns for each word in sentences s, unnormalized
--   probabilities of word classes.
label :: Bool -> WordClass -> Sentence -> Vector (Vector Double)

-- | <tt>predict m s</tt> returns for each word in sentence s, unnormalized
--   probabilities of words given predicted word class.
predict :: WordClass -> Sentence -> [Vector (Double, Text)]
